name: Space Bar Smash
description:
Space Bar Smash!

This game was created by BlazeBytes and King.exe for the Games Factory Jam

With music by Ozzed 

The jam's themes were...

CHOICES

A.I

COOKIE

And the jam's constraint was..

ONLY USE THE SPACE BAR

With that said, we hope you like it!

STORY

Its the year 30XX, and the International Cookie Company (INCC) Has bought out every single other company on the planet
...
The world has become a distopian hellscape.
...
You are a rebel robot that must defeat several security drones, to reach the CEO of INCC and destroy them!!!
